title: Executive Order 5939-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands Pending Resurvey, New Mexico
content: It is hereby ordered that Executive Order No. 5452, dated September 25, 1930, which withdrew the public lands in T. 26 N., R. 11 W., New Mexico principal meridian, New Mexico, pending a resurvey, be, and the same is hereby, revoked.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5939-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands Pending Resurvey, New Mexico Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361515
